name: vs-seeker
effect: Reveals trainers who want a rematch, by showing !! over their heads. Each use drains the battery; requires 100 steps to charge.
short_effect: Allows rebattling of on-screen trainers. 100 steps to recharge.

flavor_text.emerald: A rechargeable unit that flags battle- ready TRAINERS.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A device that indicates TRAINERS who want to battle. The battery charges while traveling.
